base_description: Rectangular gray switch plate with rounded edges.
part_description: Includes two screws symmetrically placed on either side and a central switch cutout.
internal_interaction_description: The screws secure the plate to the wall, aligning with the central switch cutout to accommodate a toggle or rocker switch mechanism.
external_interaction_description: The switch plate covers electrical switches, protecting users from wiring while allowing switch operation. It interacts with walls and electrical systems, ensuring safety and aesthetic integration in various environments.
